branchCategory.name: 90-AFD20-40, AFD Mist Separator
branchCategory.description: <p>Micro mist separator series 90-AFD is available in 2 sizes. Port sizes range from 1/4 to 3/4.  90-AFD is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. Accessories include bracket, float type auto drain, and differential pressure type auto drain.</p>
